verse: 'frogs Ex. 8:6', 'flies Ex. 8:24', 'lice Ex. 8:18', 'locust Ex. 10:13', 'darkness Ex. 10:22-23', 'thunder and hail Ex. 9:23', 'Nile turn to blood Ex. 7:20', 'boils Ex. 9:10', 'murrian Ex. 9:6', 'death of all the first born Ex. 12:29'
